timeline.message: Updated geSearchMode description to include high-level overview of different modes
Added back inital description for more clarity

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change + "Default - Matches partial words only
" + "Default - Matches exact text only
"
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -112,7 +112,10 @@ default boolean highlightSearchMatch() position = 8, keyName = "geSearchMode", name = "Search Mode", - description = "The search mode to use for the GE" + description = "The search mode to use for the GE
" + + "Default - Matches partial words only
"

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change + "Fuzzy Only - Matches abbreviations and misspellings as well
" + "Fuzzy Only - Matches inexact text such as 'sara sword'
"
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -112,7 +112,10 @@ default boolean highlightSearchMatch() position = 8, keyName = "geSearchMode", name = "Search Mode", - description = "The search mode to use for the GE" + description = "The search mode to use for the GE
" + + "Default - Matches partial words only
" + + "Fuzzy Only - Matches abbreviations and misspellings as well
"

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			+ "Fuzzy Fallback - Uses fuzzy only when no default matches found"
          
          
            
            			+ "Fuzzy Fallback - Uses default search, falling back to fuzzy search if no results were found that way"

timeline.diffHunk:

" + + "Default - Matches partial words only
" + + "Fuzzy Only - Matches abbreviations and misspellings as well
" + + "Fuzzy Fallback - Uses fuzzy only when no default matches found"

timeline.bodyText:
From feedback on discord

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            			+ "Fuzzy Fallback - Uses default search, falling back to fuzzy search if no results were found that way"
